phrs.translation: 名字, 克恩斯, 姓
乔安娜·科恩斯, 科恩斯, 母亲, 母亲玛姬

sentences.sentence: Majority of fans and spectators want to Alan Thicke and Joanna Kerns to combine and get married!
sentences.translation: 大家好！广大影迷和观众都希望艾伦·锡克和乔安娜·科恩斯能够结合，结婚！

sentences.sentence: We all saw it, and want to be able to give you Alan Thicke Joanna Kerns marry him the ideal wife!
sentences.translation: 我们大家都看出来了，希望艾伦·锡克能够向你的理想夫人乔安娜·科恩斯求婚！

sentences.sentence: The firm also allowed me to bring my secretary, Barbara Kerns, who had been with me for four years by then and knew all my family, friends, and supporters.
sentences.translation: 事务所还允许我带来了我的秘书芭芭拉。克思斯，她到那时为止已经跟随了我四年，她认识我所有的家人、朋友和支持者。
